title: Feature Deep Dive
context: Focused exploration of a specific feature - understanding usage patterns, satisfaction, and improvement opportunities.

questions.base_question_text: How often do you use this feature, and in what situations?
questions.research_objective: Understand usage frequency and triggering contexts

questions.base_question_text: Walk me through how you typically use this feature from start to finish.
questions.research_objective: Map the user's actual workflow and identify any workarounds

questions.base_question_text: What do you like most about how this feature works?
questions.research_objective: Identify strengths and aspects to preserve or amplify

questions.base_question_text: What's the most frustrating part of using this feature?
questions.research_objective: Uncover pain points and areas for improvement

questions.base_question_text: How does this feature compare to similar features you've used in other products?
questions.research_objective: Understand competitive context and user expectations
